item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

err your whole thing is like wrong… you got if its off that it turns it on but also has no prayer? :z

      case 21247: // Protect From Melee
                if (ProtMelee == false) {
                    noprayer();
                    ResetProtPrayers();
                    NewDrain = 0;
                    headIcon = 0;
                    ProtMelee = false;
                } else if (ProtMelee == true) {
                    DrainPray = true;
                    ProtMelee = true;
                    newdrain();
                    newheadicon2 = 1;
                    headIcon = newheadicon2;
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                }
                break;

that should be your new code.
